definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Somebody, in the session, is disengaged and sabotages the effort.
sentences.chinese: 在頭腦風暴會議中，有人溜號而且破壞所作的努力。

sentences.english: So don’t let your life and your mind slip away.
sentences.chinese: 因此，不要讓你的生活和心智經常溜號。
